org.metastatic.sexp4j

Class AdvancedWriter.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metastatic.sexp4j.AdvancedWriter.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AdvancedWriter

    public static class AdvancedWriter.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for advanced writers.

    At minimum, when building a writer, you need to specify an OutputStream; line length and indents are optional.
